attributes.title: StAn TWICE 🤩
attributes.review:
그런 날이 있어
갑자기 혼자인 것만 같은 날
어딜 가도 내 자리가 아닌 것만 같고
고갠 떨궈지는 날
그럴 때마다 내게
얼마나 내가 소중한지
말해주는 너의 그 한마디에
Everything's alright
초라한 nobody에서 다시 somebody
특별한 나로 변해
You make me feel special
세상이 아무리 날 주저앉혀도
아프고 아픈 말들이 날 찔러도
네가 있어 난 다시 웃어
That's what you do
Again I feel special
아무것도 아닌 존재 같다가도
사라져도 모를 사람 같다가도
날 부르는 네 목소리에
I feel loved, I feel so special
자꾸 숨고만 싶어서
마주 하기가 싫어서
모든 게 의미를 잃은 듯이
내가 의미를 잃은 듯이 가만히 주저앉아 있을 때
그때 내 앞에 나타난 너의
따뜻한 미소와 손길에 (hey)
Everything's alright
초라한 nobody에서 다시 somebody
특별한 나로 변해
You make me feel special
세상이 아무리 날 주저앉혀도 (앉혀도)
아프고 아픈 말들이 날 찔러도
네가 있어 난 다시 웃어
That's what you do
Again I feel special
아무것도 아닌 존재 같다가도 (같다가도)
사라져도 모를 사람 같다가도
날 부르는 네 목소리에
I feel loved, I feel so special
Uh, you make everything alright…

attributes.title: Disgusted
attributes.review:
This app is THE worst app on the App Store. It reveals FALSE INFORMATION 😡 It said Trump would be coming to the tre🌲✨but as it turns out, this app is as fake as the way he tastes. This might be against the law to reveal, but...TRUMP DOESN’T TASTE LIKE A HOT CHEETO 😱I have many witnesses and test subjects who can confirm this. I’m sorry that our president has failed us once again 😢 And I’m also sorry to say that...that...

TRUMP PUT THE MUFFINS IN THE FREEZER

attributes.title: Don’t do it
attributes.review: I am absolutely mortified and how bad this app worked first of all it took like 10 years to download when I have  perfectly good Wi-Fi and then after that it made my phone glitch horribly and it stopped working until I deleted the app zero out of 10 would not recommend

attributes.title: why do we have a cheeto as a president
attributes.review: y’all why do we have a cheeto man as a president. might as well make the koolaid man our vice president as well. this app glitches so much and i was trying to fix it but a car almost ran me over 😡😡😡😡😡 i want this app OFF OF HERE. it’s causing a lot of near deaths and all i want is safety for our country🥳 anyways bernie 2020🤩

attributes.title: Straightbutwatcheslesbianporn
attributes.review: It took days to download and in the process my phone glitched so many times the porn I watched the previous days kept popping up while my mom was with me my phone is still super glitchy from trying to download the app and now my mom knows I watch porn and so do all my aunts.

attributes.title: Disgrace
attributes.review: I’m sure by now we have all seen the video of the little girl calling our so-called president a disgrace  .and that’s exactly what he is ,anyone who supports him is a disgrace too 🤬🤯. This man is a rapist sexist and racist

attributes.title: Terrible!!
attributes.review: This app was slow to download and keeps on glitching. Not only is it slow overall, but ever since I downloaded it, my whole phone hasn’t been working properly! I do not recommend this app, though if you’d like you can use the website instead not the app.

attributes.title: Traumatized.
attributes.review: BZZ PIT PAT! That is the sound my phone made when I opened this app. This app completed wrecked my OLD phone. Notice how I said OLD. THIS TERRIBLE APP MADE MY GOSH DANG PHONE EXPLODE. (Not to mention it took 18 hours to download). My phone was severely hot when I opened the app too. Even my fish knew this app was terrible. If you download this app you are messed up in the head and good luck replacing your phone. Bye.

attributes.title: Give me robux pls
attributes.review: Trump didn’t die 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭🤬🤬🤬😡😡🤬😡😡🤬😡🤬😡🤬😡🤬. The music played and the whole army was after me 🤬🤬🤬😡😡🤬🤬😡🤬. My hand got bitten by cockroaches😭😭😭😭. He also found my phone number and now knows my house address. Also we can’t drive like Russia “Road is road you can drive wherever you want!”🤬🤬😭😭😡😡 It was on tik tok so it real! Also plz give robux

attributes.title: Horrible.
attributes.review: I was using the app with music playing. Then out of nowhere, trumps face kept popping up next to my location. Then, someone came to my house and slammed my grandma’s head on the table and told my disable brother, (who’s in a wheelchair) that if he runs 3 laps around the patio he won’t make him eat his ba-booty. What is wrong with you people?!
